definitions: the removal of contaminants from something

examples.text: his blood is pumped out and, after purification, pumped back in

definitions: the process of extracting something from a substance

examples.text: the purification of DNA from any sample type

shortDefinitions: process of extracting something from substance

definitions: the process of making something spiritually or ceremonially clean

examples.text: purification of the mind through reflection and contemplation
the goal of the religious fast is purification of the soul
being conscious of evil, they engaged in purifications

shortDefinitions: process of making something spiritually or ceremonially clean
